com.compendium.io.xml
Class XMLImport

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.compendium.io.xml.XMLImport
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class XMLImport
extends java.lang.Thread

XMLImport imports Compendium views and nodes from an xml text file conforming to the Compendium.dtd.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Michelle Bachler

processNodeView

private void processNodeView(java.lang.String viewid,
                             java.lang.String nodeid,
                             int xPos,
                             int yPos,
                             java.util.Date transCreationDate,
                             java.util.Date transModDate,
                             boolean bShowTags,
                             boolean bShowText,
                             boolean bShowTrans,
                             boolean bShowWeight,
                             boolean bSmallIcon,
                             boolean bHideIcon,
                             int nWrapWidth,
                             int nFontSize,
                             java.lang.String sFontFace,
                             int nFontStyle,
                             int nForeground,
                             int nBackground)
Process the given view and node id data to create the view/node relationship.

Parameters:
viewid, - the id of the view the node with the given node id is in.
nodeidm, - the id of the node to add to the view with the given view id.
xPos, - the x position to add this node at in the view.
yPos, - the y position to add this node at in the view.
transCreationDate, - the date the node was put into the view.
transModDate, - the date the view-node data was last modified.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.

private void processNode(IModel model,
                         IView view,
                         org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                         int xPos,
                         int yPos,

                         java.util.Date transCreationDate,

                         boolean bHideIcon,
                         int nWrapWidth,
                         int nFontSize,
                         java.lang.String sFontFace,
                         int nFontStyle,
                         int nForeground,
                         int nBackground)
Process the given node data and create, as required, the associated NodeSummary objects and additional data.

Parameters:
oModel - com.compendium.datamodel.IModel, - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
view - com.compendium.datamodel.IView, the view to add the node to.
node, - the XML Node of Node data to process.
xPos, - the x position to add this node at.
yPos, - the y position to add this node at.
currentViewId, - the id of the current view being imported into.
transCreationDate, - the date the node was put into the view.
transModDate, - the date the view-node data was last modified.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.

processDetailPages

private void processDetailPages(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                NodeSummary newNode,
                                boolean didExist,
                                long lCreationDate,
                                long lModDate)
Process the XML Node containing a list of detail page data.

Parameters:
node, - the XML Node containing the list of detail page data to process.
node - com.compendium.datamodel.NodeSummary, the Node the detail pages should be added to.
didExist, - indicates if a node with the same id as the node passed already existed in this database.
lCreationDate, - the creation date of the given node.
lModDate, - the date the passed node was last modified.

private void processShortcuts()

CURRENTLY DOES NOTHING, JUST RETURNS THE POSITION GIVEN.

includeInDetails

private java.lang.String includeInDetails(java.lang.String detail,
                                          java.lang.String author,
                                          long lCreationDate,
                                          long lModeDate)
If the user has chosen to change the date and author but request the original information be preserved, create a string with the original date/author information appended to the current node detail.

Parameters:
detail, - the current first page of node detail text.
author, - the author for this node.
lCreationDate, - the date in milliseconds when this node was created.
lModDate, - the date in milliseconds when this node was last modified.
Returns:
java.lang.String, the detail text with author/date info appended.

                         throws java.lang.Exception
Creates an INodeSummary object and adds it to the model and view

Parameters:
oModel - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
view - the view to add the node to.
currentViewId - the id of the current view being imported into.
nType - the type of the node to add.
importedid - the id of the node in the importation information.
sOriginalID - the first orignal id of this node.
author - the author of this node.
lCreationDate - the date in milliseconds when this node was created.
lModDate - the date in milliseconds when this node was last modified.
sLabel - the label of the node to add.
sDeail - the first/main page of detail text for the node to add.
sSource - the path for external reference / url this node point to.
sImage - a path to any image file this node references.
imagewidth - the width to draw the node image.
imageheight - the height to draw the node image.
ptPos - the position in the given view to add to node at.
transCreationDate - the date the node was put into the view.
transModDate - the date the view-node data was last modified.
sLastModAuthor - the author who last modified this node.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
Throws:
Exception, - if something goes wrong.
java.lang.Exception

private void createLink(IModel oModel,
                        IView view,
                        java.lang.String currentViewId,
                        java.lang.String sType,
                        java.lang.String sImportedId,
                        java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                        java.lang.String sFromId,
                        java.lang.String sToId,
                        java.lang.String sLabel,
                        int nArrow)
Creates a ILink object and adds it to the model and view

Parameters:
oModel - com.compendium.datamodel.IModel, - NOT CURRENTLY USED.
view - com.compendium.datamodel.View, the view to add the link to.
currentViewId, - the id of the current view being imported into.
sType, - the type of the link to add.
importedid, - the id of the link in the importation information.
sOriginalID, - the first orignal id of this link.
sFromId, - the id number of the node the link comes from.
sToId, - the id number of the node the link goes to.
nArrow, - the type of arrow heads to draw.

                     IView view,
